definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

pinyin: ju1 min2 xiao1 fei4 jia4 ge2 zhi3 shu4
xiao1 fei4 jia4 ge2 zhi3 shu4

sentences.english: Prices are differents depend on the type.
sentences.chinese: 價格根據型號有所不同。

sentences.english: For years, the government has been buoying up cotton prices.
sentences.chinese: 多年來政府一直保持棉花高價格。

sentences.english: Grocery stores, for example, will have pricing power they haven't experienced in years.
sentences.chinese: 例如百貨店，就擁有幾年前沒有的價格上的優勢。

sentences.english: We are now in no way to make any further concession in price.
sentences.chinese: 我們應經無法再在價格方面做出讓步了。

sentences.english: Thailand, Malaysia and the Philippines are considering new price controls or subsidies.
sentences.chinese: 泰國，馬來西亞以及菲律賓都在考慮價格控制和補貼。

sentences.english: The supplies of sugar have been running low,causing a rise in the price.
sentences.chinese: 糖的供應日漸短缺，從而引起價格的上漲。

sentences.english: The price is set in scrip.
sentences.chinese: 價格是按遊戲通貨計算的。

sentences.english: "Electronics are a lot easier to compare online, " Robertson said.
sentences.chinese: 羅伯特森認爲，“網上更容易比較電子產品的價格。

sentences.english: At this price, OQ is the maximum quantity that can be sold.
sentences.chinese: 在此價格上，OQ是能夠售出的最大產量。

sentences.english: In flush times, the convenience of buying a bottle of water seemed to justify its $1-plus price.
sentences.chinese: 購買了一瓶水的方便似乎證明了其1美元以上的價格。

sentences.english: The increase of gross price level is the sacrifice a country makes for exercizing its function.
sentences.chinese: 價格總水平的上漲是國家爲實現其職能所付出的代價。

sentences.english: I would like to discuss the price of Indonesian Beige materials of your company.
sentences.chinese: 想跟您商量一下貴公司印尼米黃荒料的價格。

sentences.english: But the amounts they have put on the table have been small.
sentences.chinese: 但是在桌面上提出來的價格是這麼少。

sentences.english: All the quotation on the list are subject to our final confirmation.
sentences.chinese: 單中所有價格以我方最後確認爲準。

sentences.english: The new policy on food price will hurt the interest of people on low incomes.
sentences.chinese: 新的食品價格政策將傷害到低收入人羣的利益。

sentences.english: With the oil prices up, people would rather to use E-bike.
sentences.chinese: 隨着石油價格的上漲，人們更加願意使用電單車。

definition: to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt
to set a price/to fix a price
to quote a price/seller's first offer
